help-file.title: WINDWALK
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <caster> & <player> or <mob> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Teleportation
"Windwalk" is a more powerful version of the "Teleport" spell. It allows the caster to ride the winds and instantly travel to any player or mob within a distance-specific area (distance is dependant on the proficiency of the caster).
